title: Drawing, "Two-masted chooner, with dory [Maine scene, Saco Bay?]", 1894
medium: Brush and watercolor on white paper
signed: Signed and dated in brush and red wash, at lower right: HOMER 1894
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Vertical view of a two-masted schooner, with a dory, characterized by a pale wash on sky and reflections of masts and the sail in the water.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two-masted chooner, with dory [Maine scene, Saco Bay?]", 1894.
1894. Brush and watercolor on white paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-189.
